column1: in memory of cindy l. wilson -- kassly mortuary| cindy l. wilson. may 27
column14: 2015 surrounded by her loving family. cindy loved to travel
column16: especially fishing. she was preceded in death by her son
column21: pete mike. she is survived by her husband
column27: fl and brendon l. wilson of terre haute
column29: katharyn a. wilson-rickert and george h. rickert; her great-granddaughter
column30: addelynn w. crawford; her brothers and sisters
column39: and joseph mike of granite city
column40: il and robert weaver of phoenix
column41: az. cindy is also survived by nieces
column42: nephews and cousins. memorials may be made to the american diabetes association. condolences may be expressed to the family online at www. kasslyfuneral. com. visitation will be held from 5:00 pm to 7:00 pm on monday

column50: il with rev. chad townsley officiating. interment will be in holy family st. joseph cemetery
